distros.name: Linux Mint
distros.description: Been here for quite a while. Community-driven, stable and familiar. Works well even on 10-15 years old compuers.

distros.name: Zorin OS
distros.description: A fresh optimised distro with many layouts out-of-the-box including Windows-like.

distros.name: Pop!_OS
distros.description: Built by System76, featuring a unique desktop environment and focusing on usability. Nvidia version is available.

distros.name: Aurora
distros.description: A user-friendly stable immutable distro - the future of the Linux desktop. Nvidia version is available.

distros.name: Fedora KDE
distros.description: Perfect environment for development and daily use.

distros.name: Fedora Workstation
distros.description: Perfect environment for development and daily use with Gnome desktop.

distros.name: Bluefin
distros.description: Built on top of Fedora atomic, Bluefin is an immutable user-friendly distro, perfect for development and daily use.

distros.name: Bazzite KDE
distros.description: Bazzite KDE is a gaming-focused Linux distribution with KDE Plasma desktop, optimized for gaming and Windows-like experience.

distros.name: Bazzite GNOME
distros.description: Bazzite GNOME is a gaming-focused Linux distribution with GNOME desktop, providing an excellent gaming experience.

distros.name: CachyOS
distros.description: An Arch-based distribution optimized for performance, featuring excellent development tools and Windows-like layout. Requires some terminal experience.

distros.name: Lubuntu
distros.description: Lubuntu is a lightweight Ubuntu variant using LXQt, perfect for older hardware and providing a user-friendly experience.

distros.name: Linux Lite
distros.description: A lightweight Linux distro with a sleek design.
